function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Worsening market conditions impacting fund performance","Impact":"Regression of Sharpe and reward to VAR","Mitigation":"Implement proactive risk management strategies, diversify investments, and consider dynamic asset allocation.","Technologies":"Risk assessment tools, predictive analytics, and portfolio optimization software","People":"Investors, fund managers, and financial analysts","Owner":"Investment firms, financial institutions, and regulatory bodies"},{"Description":"Negative risk-adjusted returns in phase 3 for treasury funds","Impact":"Financial losses, reduced investor confidence, and potential fund withdrawals","Mitigation":"Reallocate assets, hedge against market volatility, and consider alternative investment options.","Technologies":"Asset management software, hedging instruments, and risk hedging models","People":"Treasury fund investors, fund managers, and financial advisors","Owner":"Treasury fund management companies and asset management firms"},{"Description":"Transition from positive to negative performance for equity funds in phases 2 and 3","Impact":"Loss of investor confidence, potential fund withdrawals, and negative impact on market sentiment","Mitigation":"Implement risk monitoring, dynamic asset allocation, and stress testing strategies.","Technologies":"Portfolio management tools, stress testing models, and risk analytics software","People":"Equity fund investors, fund managers, and market analysts","Owner":"Equity fund management companies and regulatory bodies"}]}
